name: Cast Seals of the General Archives of the Kingdom
references: Collection de moulages de sceaux des Archives générales du Royaume
description: A collection of 19 casts of seals made by the General State Archives in Brussels.
Thousands of casts were made by the General State Archives in Brussels.
The original casts were made beginning in 1864.
It is unclear when these 19 casts were made as they likely are copies of the originals.
You can read more about this collection here.
Seal #369: year 1334; + SIGILLVM . OPIDI . THENENSIS; Charters of Brabant, n° 405
Seal #528: year 1372; SIGILLVM . PROPRIVM / . OPIDI . LEWENSIS; Chartes de Brabant, n° 2905
Seal #635: year 1208; SIGILLVM : MA / TILDIS : DVCISSE LOTHARINGIE RAL; Archives ecclésiastiques, Chartrier de l'abbaye Sainte-Gertrude à Louvain, 10256/8
Seal #1206: year 1339; S' . SCABINOR' . ET . BVRGENS' . ALDENARDENSIVM; Chartes de Brabant, n° 621/bis
Seal #1476: year 1298; S' . PREPOSITORVM E/T . SCABINORVM : CVRTRACENSIVM; Chartes de Flandre, I, 1083
Seal #1526; year 1274; S' . SCABINORVM : ET COMINITATIS . FRAVNCI OFICI : BRVGENSIS; Chartes de Flandre, I, 508
Seal #1851; year 966; LOTHARIVS : DEI GRACIA . REX . FRANCORVM; Abbaye de Saint-Bavon, chartrier
Seal #2365; year 1701; SIGILLVM SCABINORUM DE AINGHIEN; Augustins d'Enghien (détruit en 1940)
Seal #2493; year ?; S' SCABINORVM GEMBLACEN; Musée de Namur, hôtel de Gaiffier, matrices
Seal #17591; year 941; SIGNV ARNVL[IILI]NDRENSIS MARC[HIO]; Abbaye de Saint-Pierre à Gand. Fonds van Lokeren n° 18
